channel.title: Testscape can't find files
channel.description:
I have testscape, and I copied the stuff to the HybridScape folder (emptied first obviously) and then I ran the server to try it out, and I got this:
[code]npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. autospawn2.cfg: file not found.[/code]
I made sure all those files were in the location the java files were looking but it still does that.
I know it's a n00b question but I'm just starting out and I'm sure you felt the same way when you first started out.

item.title: Testscape can't find files
item.dc:creator: @dbpruguy dbpruguy
item.description:
@dbpruguy wrote:

jeez am I a n00b!!! anyways how do I load a server other than hybridscape then?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 12:52:10 PM[/size][hr]and I shud mention, when I run runMoparScape.bat it says 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. and someone else told me I don’t need to do that part.

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape can't find files
item.dc:creator: @Aces316rocks Aces316rocks
item.description:
@Aces316rocks wrote:

They are 2 different clients. You don’t mix them and expect them to work o.O

Read full topic
